net.sf.structure.cdk.paint
Interface ImagePainter

All Superinterfaces:
Painter
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultImagePainter
public interface ImagePainter
extends Painter

A painter capable of creating output onto an java.awt.Image context.

Author:
Richard Apodaca
See Also:
ImageKit

Method Detail

paint

void paint(java.awt.Image image)
Paints a rendering onto image. The background color will be that specified by getBackgroundColor.

Parameters:
image - the Image that will be painted onto

setBackgroundColor

void setBackgroundColor(java.awt.Color color)
Sets the background color of this ImagePainter.

Parameters:
color - the new background color of this ImagePainter

getBackgroundColor

java.awt.Color getBackgroundColor()
Returns the background color being used by this Painter.

Returns:
the background color being used by this Painter
